GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.10.103
GSD.description:
sc16is7xx: Fix for incorrect data being transmitted

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.103 by commit 18701d8afaa1c609b3cbf7c63ef5423ab2c8d252, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 6393ff1c4435acc343b1481f5b834b918cb42b12. For more details please see the references link.
